EmailTemplate.description: Notification to customer to send missing info/ approval
EmailTemplate.name: EDI Customer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Information Required {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
We received an EDI (spec2000) order from you that requires the following information/approval to proceed.
<Insert Message body>
Please reply to this message with the required information.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
